Class LevelTwoConstructionState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.ConstructionState
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.LevelTwoConstructionState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LevelTwoConstructionState extends ConstructionState
Represents a the construction phase of a Galaxy Trucker match, using level two flight rules, includes a ConstructionStateHourglass.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelTwoConstructionState

      public LevelTwoConstructionState(ModelInstance model, GameModeType type, PlayerCount count, ArrayList<Player> players, int seconds)
      Constructs a LevelTwoConstructionState object.
      Parameters:
      model - ModelInstance ModelInstance that owns this {GameState.
      type - GameModeType Ruleset of the state.
      count - PlayerCount Size of the match.
      players - Array of all players in the match.
      seconds - Amount of seconds the ConstructionStateHourglass lasts.
